gallery.title: Temperature, humidity and pressure plots
gallery.author: Sylwester Arabas
gallery.description: We use rrdtool to plot some basic meteorological parameters. Data is coming from our institute's (http://www.igf.fuw.edu.pl/zfa/en/) meteo-station which was build from scratch by students. Rrdtool fetch command is also used for creation of datafiles available on the website.
